resources.string: pids=""; for p in /proc/[0-9]*; do read -r -d \'\' model <$p/cmdline || [[ $model ]]; if [[ $model = com.whatsapp ]]; then pids+="${p##*/},"; fi done; setprop mdgwa.pids ${pids%,}
An Xposed module to customize your WhatsApp.
When active, messages will not be deleted for you.
When active, the person cannot see that you are typing
When active, the person cannot see that you are recording audio
When active, it allows you to forward messages without the forwarding tag.
When active, it allows you to view statuses without the person knowing that you watched them.
When active, it allows you to read messages without the person knowing that you have read them.
Whenever you change something on this screen, restart WhatsApp!
Add text next to the timetable

If you\'re on this screen, it means that you don\'t have the module active yet, don\'t have LSPosed installed, or don\'t have any WhatsApp APK patched by LSPatch.\n\nPlease fix it, restart the module, and try again
When active, it allows you to open view-once messages as many times as you want.
When activated, it changes the color and icon theme to the new WhatsApp theme
When active, statuses will not be cleared for you.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam eget ligula eu lectus lobortis condimentum.
Don\'t tell the users you\'ve received the messages
This option needs root access! When enabled, WhatsApp will automatically restart to save all changes made here
This option requires root access, grant root permissions in your SU Solution
Create a button to download people\'s statuses
Change all colors in your WhatsApp, try it now!
This WhatsApp version isn\'t supported by our module, please go to the required WhatsApp version
WhatsApp isn\'t installed! Install and try again
Enable the new settings style, with a profile photo in home toolbar
Enable the new home style, with bottom navigation
Enable native filter chats, located on the top of home screen, filtering contats, business, and others
Add icons on menu options along the app
Create a stroke around some buttons on WhatsApp
New icons style, if you like, enable it
When it\'s enabled, you\'ll dont see any presence updates from other users, like typing, recording, onlineâ€¦
Remove forward limit for 5 chats (normal) and 1 chat (multiple times)
Show your account name on the top of home screen, replacing \"WhatsApp\" by your name.
Show your bio below the title of toolbar
Tap here to reset all the saved module settings
This action will reset all saved preferences in module, and you\'ll need to enable all buttons again
Customize home screen to your liking
Change some things in your conversation screen, like balloons, entry, and others
Hide read confirmation, hide receipt, last seen, and more
Download status, media settings, and more
The module is disabled on LSPosed
The module is enabled, but the scope is empty
Create a view once download button
Separate your chats by: groups, private chats, status, calls, communities
Sends the blue tick when replying to the message
Hide Archived chat and enable Toolbar on long click to access chat
